ComicInfo.Summary:
Ishida and Koshiro set out on a quest to bring back the only thing that can save their kingdom; a magic sword guarded by the ghost of a long dead Samurai. Ishida finds that the peaceful life he follows as a monk is quickly being replaced with one of violence as he and Koshiro must defend themselves from the attacks of the Demon Taku, and his wizard Azuma.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-29 15:56:32. [CVDB180263]
